trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una visualizzazione in fase di progettazione dei dati per la classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner" /> padre.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView" /> class with the provided data source designer and view name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView" /> utilizzando la finestra di progettazione dell'origine dati e il nome di visualizzazione specificati.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> control supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> associato al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> corrente supporta il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> è supportato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> control supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> associato al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> corrente supporta il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> è supportato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> control supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> associato al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> corrente supporta il paging di dati recuperati dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if paging through the data that is retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se lo scorrimento dei dati recuperati dal metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> è supportato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> associato al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> corrente supporta una visualizzazione ordinata dell'origine dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a sorted view of the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è supportata una visualizzazione ordinata dell'origine dati sottostante; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> control supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView" /> associato al controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource" /> corrente supporta il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il metodo <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> è supportato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: Numero minimo di righe da restituire.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per indicare che i dati restituiti sono dati di esempio; <see langword="false" /> per indicare che i dati restituiti sono dati reali.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i dati in fase di progettazione corrispondenti allo schema del controllo origine dati associata utilizzando il numero di righe specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se i dati costituiscono dati di esempio o dati reali.

trans-unit.source: The data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: Dati da visualizzare in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType" /> property contains an object that derives from <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType" /> contiene un oggetto che deriva da <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataContext" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType" /> property is derived from <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataContext" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto nella proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType" /> è derivato da <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.DataContext" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName" /> property returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Table`1" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName" /> restituisce un tipo <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Table`1" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName" /> property returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Table`1" /> type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName" /> restituisce un tipo <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Table`1" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo schema che descrive la vista origine dati rappresentata dall'oggetto di visualizzazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the schema.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta lo schema.
